cbinstall.name: DT Delete Me
cbinstall.author: DTH Development
cbinstall.description: This plugin gives the user the ability to delete their own user account through Community Builder 1.7+ in Joomla 1.5/2.5/3.x.

param.name: user_email_sub
param.label: User Email Subject
param.description: Email subject which will be sent to the user after they delete their account.

param.name: user_email_text
param.label: User Email Text
param.default: Your account has been successfully deleted.
param.description: Email text which will be sent to the user after they delete their account.

param.name: text_for_frontend
param.label: Text for Frontend
param.default: By clicking this Delete button, you will completely remove your user account from this site. If you are sure you want to do this, click the button below.
param.description: Text which will show above the Delete Me button in the user profile.

param.name: confirm_msg
param.label: Pop-Up Confirmation Message
param.default: Are you sure you want to delete your account? Clicking OK will immediately log you out and delete your user account.
param.description: This is the text of a confirmation popup message that a user will see when attempting to delete their account.
